display_title.display_title:
Nicaragua - Health Systems
            Strengthening and Response to Epidemiological Emergencies
            Project : Restructuring

Nicaragua - Health Systems Strengthening and
            Response to Epidemiological Emergencies Project : Restructuring

repnme.cdata!:
Nicaragua - Health Systems Strengthening
            and Response to Epidemiological Emergencies Project : Restructuring

projn:
NI-Health System Strengthening And Response
            To Epidemiological Eme -- P112906
sectr: Health and other social services,Public Administration, Law, and Justice

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed request from the Government
            of Nicaragua dated March 23, 2011, includes a reallocation
            of the Grant proceeds to cover the overdraft of 150,488
            (SDR) in Category 1 (Goods and Consultants services for
            Part A of the project), reducing funds from Category 2
            (Goods and Consultants services and Non Consultants services
            for Part B of the Project), and Category 3 (Consultant
            services for Part C of the project). The Government proposed
            this reallocation due to a substantial reduction in the
            amount of grant proceeds available for project activities
            due to a difference in exchange rates of the Special Drawing
            Rights (SDR). Despite this situation, the Government has
            carried out the activities established under the MINSA-PAHO Agreement.
